historical-bad-fit.png.description: Scatter plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising from May 1974 to December 2023, then dropping to December 2023. A model is superimposed over the data, with an S-value of 55.9 and R-Squared of -3.43
historical-bad-fit.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2

historical-scatter-plot.png.description: Scatter plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising from May 1974 to December 2023
historical-scatter-plot.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2

historical-scatter-plot-no-labels.png.description: Scatter plot showing a point cloud that slopes up and to the right
historical-scatter-plot-no-labels.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2

modern-bad-fit.png.description: Scatter plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising from January 2010 to December 2023. A model is superimposed over the data, with an S-value of 55.9 and R-Squared of -3.43
modern-bad-fit.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2

modern-co2-model-soln.png.description: Scatter plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising and falling around a positive diagonal slope from January 2010 to December 2023 with a periodic model at the top that rises and falls around a horizontal line
modern-co2-model-soln.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2

modern-co2-scatter.png.description: Scatter plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising and falling in a general positive diagonal trend from January 2010 to December 2023
modern-co2-scatter.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2

modern-lr.png.description: Linear regression plot showing global CO2 levels over time, rising and falling around a positive diagonal line from January 2010 to December 2023
modern-lr.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap team, with data from http://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu/data/atmospheric_co2
